title: Kettimelam kottum satham lyrics pesu songs lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kettimelam
Singer: Vijay Yesudas, Priya
Lyrics : Snehan
Music Director : Yuvan Shankar Raja

Kettimelam kottum satham mella ketkiradho nenjil
O hohO vetkappattu nenjam ippo aadappaarkkiradho oonjal
Kettimelam kottum satham mella ketkiradho nenjil
O hohO vetkappattu nenjam ippo aadappaarkkiradho oonjal

Nenjikkul pala aasai irukku, Neram varum podhu solven unakku
Maalai vandhaal theerum andha kanakku, Maalaiyai mannan tharuvaan
O hoho hooohhh ho...
{hindi lyrics.. not sure what it is}

Indha boomiengum, pookkum pookkalellaam,
Endhan koondhal kudippogum naal indru
Endhan kazhuththinil oru maalaiyaai,
Vandhu vizhum vaanavilthaan

Un valaiyalgal, en viralgalil,
sikkikkondu sinungum naal indru
Nee naanathil thalai kunigaiyil,
vaazhththu sollum kavidhai thaane hey hey..

Kattivaiththa aasai kattavizhndhu parakka,
Ennudaiya penmai rekkaigalai virikka
Ennudaiya mannan eppozhudhum kannan.
Vandu endhan karam pidippaan

Indha naaley, nam vaazhvin irandaam baagam aagum
Naanum unnai kaippidithadhu endhan yogam aagum

Endhan vaanamengum, pala ninaivugal,
ennai utruppaarkkindradhy nenjey
en manadhukkul oru maaligai irukkudhey unakkaaga...

Indha ulagiley, miga azhagiyai,
sondhamaakka poagiren naan indru
Aval enakkena endru therindhadhum,
enni enni viyandheney ye hey

Ingu thaaney boomi pudhithaai irukku,
idhupoala inbam vandhadhillai enakkum
Manja thaali kodu mazhalaippol thodu,
mella mella sivakkiren

Minnal theril naan unnai amarththi vaan veli poaven
megam kondey nee vaazhum veettai katti mudippen

Kettimelam kottum satham mella ketkiradho nenjil
O hohO vetkappattu nenjam ippo aadappaarkkiradho oonjal

Nenjikkul pala aasai irukku
Neram varum podhu solven unakku
Maalai vandhaal theerum andha kanakku
Maalaiyai mannan tharuvaan
O hoho hooohhh ho...
